text: Motion
Motion

──Coffee's ready, here you go☆
You take it black, right?

Oh, thank you.
I'm sorry... for just dropping off the documents.

Nah, it's no trouble at all.
Can't just leave you at the doorstep, you know?

Oh, but if you're busy,
you don't have to go out of your way like this, okay...?

Haha, I'm fine today.
Well then... I'll gladly accept it.

Here you go! Enjoy~
I wonder if it's brewed to your liking?

.........
Ah, it's delicious.

Great☆
Ehehe...

...It feels kind of strange,
having Producer-san here, doesn't it?

──Oh, that's right!
I have a photo I want to show you, Producer-san!

It's from when little Tenka and Amana sang
and danced together at the school festival... Look at this!

Ah, they're both wearing cute outfits...
Haha, they looked like idols even back then.

Hehe, right?
That's why I wanted to show you.

──Producer-san,
you're the one who turned little Tenka into a real idol.

Tenka, she truly feels grateful for becoming an idol...
So, thank you from the bottom of her heart.

Hehe... Compared to back then,
maybe Tenka has grown a little now...?

Oh, but there are probably things that haven't changed either.
Like her quirks, or her dislikes... And also──

Tenka's favorites...
Those haven't changed at all since then...
